title: Just bough HEC skin and now its going on sale. Possible refund?
body:
Hi Riot, 

I recently bought Elderwood Hec skin and saw that it will be going on sale in Dec. Is there anything you guys have in place that would refund me the difference since I bought it so recently?

Thanks.

replies.body:
If you have any *refund tokens* available, you can use one to refund the purchase (inside purchase history), so long as it was within the last 90 days. If you don't have any more tokens available, then a refund is not possible. 

We announce sales ahead of time as a measure to prevent these types of situations, which is why we don't offer refunds for something that's gone on sale. Let me know if you have any questions.
